item.title: reStructuredText cheat sheet
item.description: My cheat sheet for reStructuredText syntax with examples how it will look after parsing. reStructuredText is an alternative for Markedown. Examples taken from reStructuredText Markup Specification See also reStructuredText Directives Blog arthicle metadata reStructuredText cheat sheet ############################ :date: 2014-05-03 18:00 :tags: cheatsheet, pelican :category: blog :slug: 2014-05-03-rst :author: arnulf :summary: My cheat sheet for `reStructuredText <http://docutils.
